Bio: Florence + The Machine is a British band led by Florence Welch, known for their powerful vocals, poetic lyrics, and a blend of indie rock and baroque pop. They have achieved critical and commercial success with albums like 'Lungs' and 'Ceremonials,' earning multiple awards and nominations.
My take: Florence Welch's commanding stage presence and the band's dynamic live performances have been widely praised, making them a standout act in the indie music scene.
Festival Bio (NL):
Florence Welch probeert uit alle macht met lichaam en geest in het reine te komen. Als een muzikale exorcist duikt ze in de wereld van hekserij en folkloristische horror, resulterend in haar nieuwste album ‘Everybody Scream’. Roodharige furie Welch zingt en schreeuwt zich een weg naar genezing, bijvoorbeeld op ‘One of the Greats’, waar die stem-uit-duizenden verrassend mooi uitkomt op een donkergrungy gitaarakkoordentapijt. Dat smaakt bitterzoet en naar meer. Verheug je op een diversere, maar vertrouwd uitbundige setlist: Florence + The Machine is een alom geliefde, oer- en oersterke headliner.

Foto door De Wilde
Festival Bio (EN):
Florence Welch is striving with all her might to reconcile body and mind. Like a musical exorcist, she delves into the world of witchcraft and folkloric horror, resulting in her latest album, ‘Everybody Scream’. The red-haired fury Welch sings and screams her way to healing, as on ‘One of the Greats’, where that unmistakable voice shines beautifully against a dark, grungy guitar chord backdrop. It tastes bittersweet and leaves you wanting more. Look forward to a more diverse yet familiarly exuberant setlist: Florence + The Machine is a universally beloved, raw, and incredibly powerful headliner.

Photo by De Wilde

Bio: Little Simz is a British rapper, singer, and actress known for her introspective lyrics, innovative production, and critically acclaimed albums such as 'Sometimes I Might Be Introvert' and 'Grey Area'. She has won multiple awards, including the Mercury Prize and a BRIT Award, solidifying her position as one of the most influential voices in contemporary hip-hop.
My take: Little Simz is widely praised for her lyrical depth, genre-defying sound, and captivating live performances, making her a standout artist in modern music.
Festival Bio (NL):
Kleine meisjes worden groot. Little Simz, de als Simbi Ajikawo geboren Londense artieste, rapper en actrice, is vijftien jaar na haar eerste mixtapes beslist uitgegroeid tot Big Simz. Een reis die een flinke boost kreeg met haar doorbraakalbum ‘Sometimes I Might Be Introvert’ (2021), vol klassiek geworden tracks als ‘Woman’ en ‘Point and Kill’, ook dankzij de hoog overvliegende zang van soulmaatje Obongjayar. Twee albums verder is Simz niet meer weg te denken als stralende ster van een geheel eigen muzikaal universum, als lichtend voorbeeld voor kleine meisjes everywhere.

Foto door Thibaut Grevet
Festival Bio (EN):
Little girls grow up. Little Simz, the London artist, rapper, and actress born Simbi Ajikawo, has undoubtedly evolved into Big Simz fifteen years after her first mixtapes. A journey that received a significant boost with her breakthrough album *Sometimes I Might Be Introvert* (2021), filled with tracks that have since become classics, such as "Woman" and "Point and Kill," also thanks to the soaring vocals of soul companion Obongjayar. Two albums later, Simz is now an undeniable shining star in a musical universe all her own, a guiding light for little girls everywhere.

Photo by Thibaut Grevet

Bio: The xx is a critically acclaimed British band known for their minimalist sound blending indie pop, electronic, and R&B influences. Their debut album, 'xx,' won the Mercury Prize in 2010 and they have since become renowned for their atmospheric music and intimate performances.
My take: The xx are celebrated for their innovative use of space and silence in music, creating emotionally resonant and immersive live performances.
Festival Bio (NL): Soms overstijgt een band alle goedbedoelde genrenamen en termen. Én werelden: de filmische klanken van ‘Intro’ lenen zich voor zowel schaatswedstrijden als meerdere Top Gear-avonturen. Die breedgedragen sound zegt alles over het fingerspitzengefühl van dit dreampoptrio, dat zich na ‘I See You’ (2017) stortte op soloalbums en draaitafeluitspattingen. Dat creatieve spreiden der vleugels verruimt de geest, maar soms gaat er niets boven de goddelijke som der delen met, wie weet, nieuw werk. Twee bescheiden kusjes? Nee, dit weerzien wordt een omhelzing van formaat: welkom terug, The xx!
Festival Bio (EN): Sometimes a band transcends all well-intentioned genre names and terms. And worlds: the cinematic sounds of 'Intro' lend themselves to both skating competitions and numerous Top Gear adventures. That widely embraced sound says everything about the finesse of this dream pop trio, who, after 'I See You' (2017), delved into solo albums and DJ exploits. That creative spreading of wings broadens the mind, but sometimes nothing beats the divine sum of its parts with, who knows, new work. Two modest kisses? No, this reunion will be an embrace of epic proportions: welcome back, The xx!

Bio: David Byrne is a Scottish-American musician, best known as the frontman of the influential band Talking Heads, which pioneered the New Wave genre by blending rock, punk, and world music influences. He has also had a successful solo career, exploring diverse musical styles and earning critical acclaim.
My take: David Byrne is widely regarded as a groundbreaking artist whose innovative approach to music and performance has left an indelible mark on modern music. His live shows, including the acclaimed 'American Utopia' tour, are celebrated for their creativity and theatricality.
Festival Bio (NL):
Als frontman van Talking Heads maakte David Byrne pop heerlijk weird. En in zijn solocarrière vindt de legendarische muzikant zichzelf steeds opnieuw uit. ‘American Utopia’ (2018) was zijn middelvinger naar Trumps Amerika, met politiek geëngageerde nummers die het belang van positiviteit onderstrepen. Zijn recentste album ‘Who Is The Sky?’ biedt een extra dosis zonneschijn met vrolijke songs over hoe genot in de kleinste dingetjes zit. Ironisch genoeg voert Byrne dat live doorgaans groots op. Dit belooft een uniek feestje te worden.

Foto door Shervin Lainez
Festival Bio (EN):
As the frontman of Talking Heads, David Byrne made pop delightfully weird. And in his solo career, the legendary musician continually reinvents himself. 'American Utopia' (2018) was his middle finger to Trump's America, featuring politically charged songs that emphasize the importance of positivity. His latest album, 'Who Is The Sky?', delivers an extra dose of sunshine with cheerful tracks about finding joy in the smallest things. Ironically, Byrne usually presents this live in a grand fashion. This promises to be a unique celebration.

Photo by Shervin Lainez

Bio: Empire of the Sun is an Australian electronic music duo known for their vibrant, theatrical performances and synth-driven pop hits like 'Walking on a Dream' and 'We Are the People.' Their music blends lush electronic production with catchy melodies, earning them critical acclaim and a global fanbase.
My take: Empire of the Sun is celebrated for their unique visual aesthetic and ability to craft euphoric, cinematic soundscapes, making them a standout act in the electronic and synth-pop genres. Their live performances are often described as visually stunning and immersive.
Festival Bio (NL): Nick Littlemore en Luke Steele doen met adellijke speelsheid precies waar ze zin in hebben, al dan niet sparrend in studio’s met Jay-Z, Beyoncé, Dua Lipa of Elton John. Hoofdvoorwaarde: het moet dansbaar zijn, zeker nu het electropopduo terugkeert naar de festivalvelden met hun vierde langspeler ‘Ask That God’ (2024). De Talk Talk-baslijn in ‘Changes’, de verliefdheidsvlinders in ‘The Feeling You Get’, het soms Bee Gees-achtige zangambacht en dat extravagante, onovertroffen livespektakel van Lord Littlemore en Emperor Steele: Empire Of The Sun activeert moeiteloos je blije ik.
Festival Bio (EN): Nick Littlemore and Luke Steele, with a noble playfulness, do exactly what they feel like, whether sparring in studios with Jay-Z, Beyoncé, Dua Lipa, or Elton John. The main condition: it has to be danceable, especially now that the electropop duo returns to the festival stages with their fourth album, 'Ask That God' (2024). The Talk Talk bassline in 'Changes,' the butterflies of infatuation in 'The Feeling You Get,' the occasionally Bee Gees-like vocal craftsmanship, and the extravagant, unparalleled live spectacle of Lord Littlemore and Emperor Steele: Empire Of The Sun effortlessly activates your happy self.

Bio: Loyle Carner is a British rapper known for his introspective lyrics, blending hip-hop with jazz and soul influences. He has received critical acclaim for albums like 'Yesterday's Gone' and 'Not Waving, But Drowning', earning multiple award nominations.
My take: Loyle Carner is celebrated for his heartfelt storytelling and smooth delivery, with live performances often praised for their intimacy and emotional resonance.
Festival Bio (NL): De Zuid-Londense rapper Loyle Carner is een woordkunstenaar zoals je ze maar een paar keer per generatie tegenkomt. Zijn muziek is een soepel amalgaam van soul, jazz en softrock, dat laatste sinds zijn recentste album ‘Hopefully !’ – een plaat waarop de begin-dertiger hoorbaar worstelt met de do’s en don’ts van het verse vaderschap. Een thema dat zich goed leent voor zijn bekentenisrap vol poëtische vondsten en kalme flow, die hem onlangs al een headlinespot op Glastonbury en een dubbel uitpuilende AFAS Live opleverde.
Festival Bio (EN): The South London rapper Loyle Carner is a wordsmith of the kind you encounter only a few times per generation. His music is a smooth amalgam of soul, jazz, and soft rock, the latter since his most recent album 'Hopefully !' – a record on which the thirty-something audibly grapples with the do's and don'ts of newfound fatherhood. A theme well-suited to his confessional rap, full of poetic insights and a calm flow, which recently earned him a headline spot at Glastonbury and a double sold-out AFAS Live.

Bio: All Them Witches is a Nashville-based band known for their fusion of psychedelic rock, blues, and stoner rock, creating a sound that is both heavy and atmospheric. They have gained a dedicated following through their dynamic live performances and critically acclaimed albums like 'Dying Surfer Meets His Maker' and 'Sleeping Through the War.'
My take: All Them Witches are celebrated for their ability to blend genres seamlessly and deliver powerful, immersive live shows, making them a standout act in the modern rock scene.
Festival Bio (NL):
Houd je van blues én van psychedelica? Smelt je bij progressive rock en krijg je knikkende knieën van stoner? Dan zit je geheid goed bij All Them Witches, het hard rockende trio (voorheen viertal) uit Nashville, dat van genrehopping zijn artistieke levensdoel heeft gemaakt. Alle voornoemde piketpaaltjes worden daarbij hartstochtelijk gekoesterd en dan zijn we er nog lang niet. Toch slaagt de band erin om al ettelijke albums en optredens lang een herkenbaar eigen smoel op te zetten, dat ook menig rabbit zal betoveren.

Foto door Dylan Hanley
Festival Bio (EN):
Do you love blues and psychedelics? Do you melt for progressive rock and get weak in the knees for stoner? Then you're in the right place with All Them Witches, the hard-rocking trio (formerly a quartet) from Nashville, who have made genre-hopping their artistic mission. All the aforementioned markers are passionately embraced, and that's just the beginning. Yet the band manages to maintain a distinctive identity throughout numerous albums and performances, one that will enchant many a rabbit.

Photo by Dylan Hanley

Bio: Apparat, the stage name of Sascha Ring, is a German electronic musician and producer known for blending ambient, experimental, and techno elements in his music. He has gained critical acclaim for his solo work as well as collaborations with Modeselektor in the project Moderat.
My take: Apparat is celebrated for his emotive soundscapes and innovative production, with live performances that often combine immersive visuals and atmospheric music.
Festival Bio (NL): Sascha Ring ontpopte zich zo’n 25 jaar geleden in de Berlijnse dancescene, toen de Duitse hoofdstad volledig in het teken stond van de minimal techno. Als Apparat bezielde hij dat ingetogen genre met complexere ritmes en diepere emoties. Sindsdien staat hij garant voor melodieuze en meeslepende elektronische muziek, die moeiteloos laveert tussen ambient, pop en techno. Met de heren van Modeselektor vormde hij supergroep Moderat en serveerde hij dance op blockbusterschaal. En als soloproject is Apparat nog altijd een synoniem voor immersieve en vooruitstrevende dance die ontroert en overdondert.
Festival Bio (EN): Sascha Ring emerged about 25 years ago in the Berlin dance scene, at a time when the German capital was entirely dominated by minimal techno. As Apparat, he infused that restrained genre with more complex rhythms and deeper emotions. Since then, he has been synonymous with melodic and captivating electronic music, effortlessly navigating between ambient, pop, and techno. Together with the members of Modeselektor, he formed the supergroup Moderat, delivering dance music on a blockbuster scale. And as a solo project, Apparat remains a synonym for immersive and progressive dance music that moves and overwhelms.

Bio: Beirut is an indie folk band led by Zach Condon, known for blending diverse musical influences such as Balkan folk, French chanson, and American indie rock. Their albums like 'Gulag Orkestar' and 'The Flying Club Cup' have received critical acclaim for their eclectic instrumentation and global sound.
My take: Beirut's artistry is widely praised for its unique fusion of global musical styles, and their live performances are celebrated for their rich, orchestral arrangements and emotional depth.
Festival Bio (NL): Toen Beirut werd gevraagd door de Zweedse circusgroep Kompani Giraff om hun nieuwste show ‘A Study of Losses’ van een soundtrack te voorzien, resulteerde dat in een heerlijke worp puntgave poppareltjes waarin het wemelt van sepia-getinte melancholie. Overigens zijn we sinds debuutalbum ‘Gulag Orkestar’ (2006) zulke emotionele koorddansacts van Zach Condon en zijn band gewend. Al bijna twee decennia staat hij garant voor schilderachtige en folky popliedjes, die blijkbaar niet alleen harten, maar ook acrobaten in vervoering kunnen brengen.
Festival Bio (EN): When Beirut was asked by the Swedish circus group Kompani Giraff to provide a soundtrack for their latest show, ‘A Study of Losses,’ it resulted in a delightful collection of flawless pop gems brimming with sepia-tinged melancholy. Incidentally, since their debut album ‘Gulag Orkestar’ (2006), we’ve come to expect such emotional tightrope acts from Zach Condon and his band. For nearly two decades, he has been delivering picturesque and folky pop songs that apparently can captivate not only hearts but also acrobats.

Bio: CMAT is an Irish singer-songwriter known for her witty, narrative-driven lyrics and a unique blend of indie pop and country influences. Her music often explores themes of heartbreak, humor, and modern life, earning critical acclaim for her debut album 'If My Wife New I'd Be Dead' in 2022.
My take: CMAT has been praised for her sharp songwriting, charismatic personality, and engaging live performances, making her a standout in the indie music scene.
Festival Bio (NL):
Wie zegt dat country dood is? CMAT bewijst al ruim drie albums het tegendeel. De Ierse singer-songwriter pimpt de klassieke Nashville-sound op in vlijmscherpe en humoristische songs, die de ellende van de wereld tegen het daglicht houden. Haar nieuwste album ‘EURO-COUNTRY’ is niet alleen een perfecte omschrijving van haar unieke muzikale stijl, maar ook een bevlogen aanklacht tegen het kapitalisme dat Ierland heeft uitgehold. Openhartig en onbevreesd, dat is Ciara Mary-Alice Thompson al helemaal op het podium, waar ze met een brede grijns tegen alle heilige huisjes aanschopt.

Foto door Sarah Doyle
Festival Bio (EN):
Who says country is dead? CMAT has been proving the opposite for over three albums now. The Irish singer-songwriter revamps the classic Nashville sound with razor-sharp and humorous songs that shed light on the world's woes. Her latest album, ‘EURO-COUNTRY,’ is not only a perfect description of her unique musical style but also a passionate indictment of the capitalism that has hollowed out Ireland. Open and fearless, that's Ciara Mary-Alice Thompson, especially on stage, where she takes aim at all sacred cows with a wide grin.

Photo by Sarah Doyle

Bio: Paradise Bangkok Molam International Band is a Thai group that blends traditional Molam music with modern elements like funk and dub, creating a unique and vibrant sound that has gained international recognition.
My take: Their innovative fusion of traditional Thai music with contemporary genres has been praised for its authenticity and energy, making them a standout act in the world music scene.
Festival Bio (NL): De Isaan-regio in Thailand is de bakermat van molam, een uniek genre dat Thaise folk met psychedelische funk combineert. Onder leiding van DJ Maft Sai zet The Paradise Bangkok Molam International Band dit relatief onbekende genre al ruim tien jaar op de kaart. PBMIB’s avontuurlijke mix van funk, rock, elektronica, folk en psychedelia overstijgt landsgrenzen en krijgt een steeds groter podium: de Thaise heren stonden al in het voorprogramma van Damon Albarn en zijn te horen in het derde seizoen van ‘The White Lotus’.
Festival Bio (EN): The Isaan region in Thailand is the birthplace of molam, a unique genre that combines Thai folk with psychedelic funk. Led by DJ Maft Sai, The Paradise Bangkok Molam International Band has been putting this relatively unknown genre on the map for over a decade. PBMIB's adventurous mix of funk, rock, electronic, folk, and psychedelia transcends borders and is gaining an increasingly larger stage: the Thai gentlemen have already opened for Damon Albarn and can be heard in the third season of 'The White Lotus'.

Bio: Westside Cowboy is an English band formed in the iconic Johnny Roadhouse Music shop in Manchester, known for its rich musical heritage. This quartet of young musicians has already made waves with their rootsy indie rock, earning a spot at Glastonbury 2025.
My take: With their origins tied to a legendary music shop and a sound rooted in indie and roots rock, Westside Cowboy seems poised to capture attention on major stages. Their early booking at Glastonbury hints at significant potential.
Festival Bio (NL):
Soms twinkelen alle sterren precies jouw kant op. Zo werd de Engelse band Westside Cowboy opgericht in de legendarische muziekwinkel Johnny Roadhouse Music in Manchester. Daar shoppen klanten als Sir Paul McCartney en Noel Gallagher, maar ook ontelbare aanstormende muzikanten die hier hun eerste tweedehands instrumenten kochten. Karma van onschatbare waarde dus voor dit kwartet jonge honden, dat met een vuistvol rootsy indierock al meteen op Glastonbury 2025 geboekt werd. Gewoon de poolster strak in de gaten houden, dan kom je vanzelf in de Groene Heuvels.

Foto door Charlie Barclay Harris
Festival Bio (EN):
Sometimes all the stars align perfectly in your favor. That’s how the English band Westside Cowboy was formed in the legendary music shop Johnny Roadhouse Music in Manchester. A place frequented by customers like Sir Paul McCartney and Noel Gallagher, as well as countless budding musicians who bought their first second-hand instruments there. Priceless karma, then, for this quartet of young guns, who, with a fistful of rootsy indie rock, have already been booked for Glastonbury 2025. Just keep your eyes fixed on the North Star, and you’ll naturally find yourself in the Green Hills.

Photo by Charlie Barclay Harris

Bio: Dabeull Live Band delivers a fresh take on funk, blending sultry basslines and silky synths with a nostalgic yet modern sound. Known for restoring the mixing console used for Michael Jackson's 'Thriller,' the French artist brings smooth, summer-ready jams to the stage with a tight live band.
My take: Dabeull Live Band offers a compelling revival of funk, combining technical expertise with a deep love for the genre, making their live performances a treat for funk enthusiasts.
Festival Bio (NL):
Dabeull Live Band bewijst dat funk veel meer is dan een cheesy relikwie van de jaren 80. Zijn kakelverse take op het slicke genre klinkt net zo warm als de golden oldies, met wulpse baspartijen en zijdezachte synths die je trommelvliezen kietelen. De Fransman gaat zelfs zo ver in zijn funkliefde dat hij de mengtafel waarmee Michael Jacksons ‘Thriller’ is opgenomen in ere herstelde. Bijgestaan door een retestrakke band staat hij op het podium garant voor zomerse smooth jams. Dus, bring the funk!

Foto door David Vasiljevic
Festival Bio (EN):
Dabeull Live Band proves that funk is much more than a cheesy relic of the '80s. His fresh take on the slick genre sounds just as warm as the golden oldies, with sultry basslines and silky smooth synths tickling your eardrums. The Frenchman’s love for funk goes so far that he restored the mixing console used to record Michael Jackson's 'Thriller.' Backed by an incredibly tight band, he guarantees summery smooth jams on stage. So, bring the funk!

Photo by David Vasiljevic

Bio: Harry Mack is an American freestyle rapper known for his exceptional improvisational skills, creating intricate and spontaneous rap verses based on audience suggestions. He gained widespread recognition through his 'Omegle Bars' series on YouTube and his viral street performances.
My take: Harry Mack is widely praised for his unparalleled freestyle abilities, often described as a master of improvisation, and his live performances are celebrated for their energy and audience engagement.
Festival Bio (NL): Als je fenomeen Harry Mack nog niet kent, kom dan vooral kijken – en luisteren. Geheid dat je nieuwsgierigheid omslaat in pure fandom, bij het meemaken van deze grootste freestylerapper van zijn generatie. Of moet dat zijn: aller tijden? Feit is dat de Californiër uit random woorden en geïnspireerd door de situatie ter plekke compleet samenhangende en humoristische tracks in elkaar draait, die je mond doen openvallen. Zoals hij dat onderweg naar stardom al deed met zijn Venice Beach Freestyle-sessies en zijn Omegle Bars online. Harry for president!
Festival Bio (EN): If you're not yet familiar with the phenomenon Harry Mack, make sure to come and watch – and listen. Guaranteed, your curiosity will turn into pure fandom as you experience this greatest freestyle rapper of his generation. Or should we say: of all time? The fact is, the Californian crafts completely coherent and humorous tracks out of random words and inspired by the situation at hand, leaving you speechless. Just as he did on his way to stardom with his Venice Beach Freestyle sessions and his Omegle Bars online. Harry for president!

Bio: Joy Crookes is a British singer-songwriter known for her soulful voice and introspective lyrics, blending influences from jazz, R&B, and South Asian music. She has received critical acclaim for her debut album 'Skin' and was nominated for the 2020 BRIT Rising Star Award.
My take: Joy Crookes is celebrated for her rich, emotive vocal delivery and her ability to weave personal and cultural narratives into her music. Her live performances are often praised for their authenticity and emotional depth.
Festival Bio (NL): Ze was even uit beeld, Joy Crookes, de Londense zangeres van Bengaals-Ierse afkomst die in 2021 debuteerde met een wolk van een neo-soulalbum en een jaar later al eens op Down The Rabbit Hole te bewonderen was. Maar nu is ze terug. Dat het leven haar in de tussentijd niet altijd toelachte, blijkt uit de emotionele teksten op ‘Juniper’ (2025), een plaat die met retrosoul met wolkjes triphop, rap en reggae verdergaat waar de voorganger ophield. Jazzier dan Amy Winehouse, meer hiphop dan Celeste, een ware ode to Joy.
Festival Bio (EN): She had been out of the spotlight for a while, Joy Crookes, the London singer of Bengali-Irish descent who debuted in 2021 with a stunning neo-soul album and was already a highlight at Down The Rabbit Hole a year later. But now she's back. That life hasn't always smiled upon her in the meantime becomes clear from the emotional lyrics on ‘Juniper’ (2025), an album that continues where its predecessor left off with retro soul infused with touches of trip-hop, rap, and reggae. Jazzier than Amy Winehouse, more hip-hop than Celeste, a true ode to Joy.

Bio: Matt Berninger is the lead vocalist of the critically acclaimed indie rock band The National, known for his deep baritone voice and introspective lyrics. He has also released solo work, including his debut album 'Serpentine Prison' in 2020, which explores themes of melancholy and personal reflection.
My take: Matt Berninger's artistry is widely praised for its emotional depth and poetic lyricism, and his live performances are noted for their intimate and compelling delivery.
Festival Bio (NL):
Als er ooit iemand door muziek ten prooi valt aan het stendhalsyndroom, oftewel mentaal en fysiek overweldigd wordt door schoonheid, dan moet deze zielrakende bariton de oorzaak zijn. Hij kwam een schrijfblokkade en depressie te boven, pende lyrics neer voor twee The National-albums en stofte de plank af met de aanzet tot soloplaat ‘Get Sunk’. Op honkballen gekrabbelde tekstideeën werden melancholische, maar hoopgevende homeruns in samenwerking met producer en medesongsmid Sean O'Brien. In ‘Times of Difficulty’ is er maar één persoon naar wie je wilt luisteren: Matt Berninger.

Foto door Chantal Anderson
Festival Bio (EN):
If anyone were ever to fall victim to Stendhal syndrome through music—being mentally and physically overwhelmed by beauty—then this soul-stirring baritone must be the cause. He overcame writer's block and depression, penned lyrics for two The National albums, and dusted off the beginnings of his solo record, 'Get Sunk.' Text ideas scribbled on baseballs turned into melancholic yet hopeful home runs in collaboration with producer and fellow songwriter Sean O'Brien. In 'Times of Difficulty,' there’s only one person you want to listen to: Matt Berninger.

Photo by Chantal Anderson

Bio: Oklou, born Marylou Mayniel, is a French producer, singer, and songwriter known for her ethereal blend of electronic and pop music, showcased in her critically acclaimed mixtape 'Galore' (2020). Her music often features introspective lyrics and experimental production, earning her a growing international fanbase.
My take: Oklou's artistry is praised for its emotional depth and innovative production, making her a standout in the electronic pop scene. Her live performances are noted for their intimate and immersive quality.
Festival Bio (NL): Ergens tussen helende ambient, sprankelende hyperpop en verkwikkende clubmuziek vind je de emotionele kern van Oklou, die in korte tijd is uitgegroeid tot een van de belangrijkste songwriters van onze tijd. Als mixtape ‘Galore’ (2020) een overtuigend voorproefje was van haar unieke producties en dromerige zangstijl, dan is debuutalbum ‘choke enough’ (2025) haar magnum opus. Er zijn weinig artiesten die zo’n perfecte balans weten te vinden tussen het alledaagse en het hemelse, twee uitersten waar Oklou met haar zijdezachte stem in intieme pareltjes behendig tussen navigeert.
Festival Bio (EN): Somewhere between healing ambient, sparkling hyperpop, and invigorating club music lies the emotional core of Oklou, who has quickly become one of the most important songwriters of our time. If the mixtape 'Galore' (2020) was a convincing preview of her unique productions and dreamy vocal style, then debut album 'choke enough' (2025) is her magnum opus. Few artists manage to strike such a perfect balance between the everyday and the celestial, two extremes that Oklou skillfully navigates with her silky voice in intimate gems.

Bio: Overmono is a British electronic music duo composed of brothers Tom and Ed Russell, known for their innovative blend of techno, breakbeat, and UK garage influences. They have gained critical acclaim for their dynamic productions and high-energy live performances.
My take: Overmono has been praised for their ability to seamlessly merge genres and deliver captivating live sets, making them a standout act in the electronic music scene.
Festival Bio (NL):
Ze passen naadloos in het exclusieve rijtje Britse elektronische liveduo’s als The Chemical Brothers, Orbital en Disclosure. Net als de laatste twee bestaat Overmono ook daadwerkelijk uit broers. Ed en Tom, om precies te zijn, en dat hebben ze dan weer gemeen met eerstgenoemden. Ook hun muzikale fruitmand biedt tal van bekende aanknopingspunten: van breakbeats en drum-’n-bass tot uk garage en techno. Geen hapslikwegsound, wel vloervullend lekker. Niet voor niets werden de Welshmen door het gezaghebbende DJ Mag uitgeroepen tot beste liveact. Over mono gesproken.

Foto door Jasmina Wood
Festival Bio (EN):
They fit seamlessly into the exclusive lineup of British electronic live duos like The Chemical Brothers, Orbital, and Disclosure. Like the latter two, Overmono also consists of brothers—Ed and Tom, to be precise—sharing that trait with the first mentioned. Their musical repertoire offers a variety of familiar touchpoints: from breakbeats and drum 'n' bass to UK garage and techno. Not a throwaway sound, but irresistibly floor-filling. It's no wonder the Welshmen were named Best Live Act by the authoritative DJ Mag. Speaking of mono.

Photo by Jasmina Wood

Bio: Sierra Ferrell is an Americana and folk singer-songwriter known for her eclectic blend of country, bluegrass, and gypsy jazz influences. Her debut album 'Long Time Coming' has been widely praised for its vintage sound and heartfelt storytelling.
My take: Sierra Ferrell is celebrated for her captivating voice and genre-blending style, with live performances that showcase her charisma and musicianship.
Festival Bio (NL): Er is veel gebeurd sinds Sierra Ferrell drie jaar geleden in de Groene Heuvels debuteerde. Zo won de altijd spectaculair gestylde singer-songwriter onlangs een Grammy voor beste americana-optreden voor ‘American Dreaming’ – en liet daarmee Beyoncé in het stof bijten. Dat heeft alles te maken met Ferrells liefde en respect voor de Amerikaanse rootstraditie, die de voormalige straatmuzikante letterlijk en figuurlijk van binnen en buiten kent: van trad-jazz en bluegrass tot outlaw country en western swing. Kom ook dansen, want Sierra Ferrell is de onbetwiste koningin van deze honky-tonk.
Festival Bio (EN): A lot has happened since Sierra Ferrell debuted in the Green Hills three years ago. The always spectacularly styled singer-songwriter recently won a Grammy for Best Americana Performance for "American Dreaming"—leaving Beyoncé in the dust. This has everything to do with Ferrell's love and respect for the American roots tradition, which the former street musician knows inside and out, both literally and figuratively: from trad-jazz and bluegrass to outlaw country and western swing. Come dance along, because Sierra Ferrell is the undisputed queen of this honky-tonk.

Bio: Son Mieux is a Dutch indie pop band known for their vibrant, anthemic songs that blend folk influences with modern pop sensibilities. They have gained recognition for their energetic live performances and their ability to craft uplifting, danceable tracks.
My take: Son Mieux has been praised for their dynamic stage presence and ability to engage audiences with their infectious melodies and heartfelt lyrics.
Festival Bio (NL):
Twee succesalbums en twee megahits (‘Multicolor’ en ‘Tonight’) kostte de komeetachtige opkomst van Son Mieux, de jongste loot aan de boom met legendarische Haagse bands. Die gigapopulariteit dankt het zevental niet alleen aan zijn aanstekelijke, breed uitwaaierende feestrock, maar zeker ook aan het charisma van de immer strakgepakte frontman Camiel Meiresonne, baas, beest en boy wonder ineen. En dat betaalt zich uit. Onder zijn aanvoering en met de driedubbelslag in de Kuip, afgelopen juni, als voorlopig hoogtepunt is Son Mieux vooral ook een onverslaanbare liveband. 

Foto door Wrister Meiresonne
Festival Bio (EN):
Two successful albums and two mega-hits ("Multicolor" and "Tonight") marked the meteoric rise of Son Mieux, the latest branch on the tree of legendary bands from The Hague. The seven-piece owes its massive popularity not only to its infectious, expansive party rock but also to the charisma of the ever-dapper frontman Camiel Meiresonne—boss, beast, and boy wonder all in one. And it pays off. Under his leadership, with the triple triumph at De Kuip this past June as the current pinnacle, Son Mieux has proven itself to be an unbeatable live band.

Photo by Wrister Meiresonne

Bio: De Staat is a Dutch band known for their inventive and fearless live performances, blending sharp social commentary with a genre-defying sound and unique visual stage presence. They have gained international acclaim, performing at major festivals and touring with iconic bands like The Rolling Stones and Muse.
My take: De Staat consistently pushes the boundaries of what a rock band can achieve, and their upcoming project 'De Staat Becomes De Staat' promises to elevate their artistry even further with a bold combination of music, live performance, and art installation.
Festival Bio (NL):
DTRH-huisvrienden De Staat staan bekend als een van Europa’s meest inventieve en onverschrokken liveacts. Al meer dan een kwarteeuw verleggen ze consequent de grenzen van wat een rockband kan zijn. Messcherpe maatschappijkritiek combineren ze met een unieke visuele podiumtaal – ‘Witch Doctor’, iemand? – en een genre-overstijgende sound die, behalve in je airplay, ook te horen was in hitgames en wereldwijde campagnes. Check die prijzenkast maar, waar onder meer Edison Awards, 3FM Awards en een Bernays Lifetime Achievement Award je tegemoetglimmen. 

All of the above bracht de internationaal gerenommeerde band bovendien naar alle wereldse windstreken: van SXSW, Glastonbury, Lowlands, Sziget, Pukkelpop, Rock Werchter en DEICHBRAND tot tours met bands als The Rolling Stones, Muse en Biffy Clyro. In 2026 keren Torre Florim en zijn kompanen terug met De Staat Becomes De Staat, een groots nieuw project rond een verse plaat, liveshow en een gigantische kunstinstallatie die de lat weer hoger zal leggen. Ondenkbaar? Bij De Staat mag je zelfs het onmogelijke voor mogelijk houden.
Festival Bio (EN):
DTRH house friends De Staat are known as one of Europe’s most inventive and fearless live acts. For over a quarter of a century, they have consistently pushed the boundaries of what a rock band can be. They combine razor-sharp social commentary with a unique visual stage language – ‘Witch Doctor,’ anyone? – and a genre-defying sound that, besides being on your airplay, has also featured in hit games and global campaigns. Just check out their trophy cabinet, gleaming with accolades like Edison Awards, 3FM Awards, and a Bernays Lifetime Achievement Award.

All of this has taken the internationally renowned band to every corner of the world: from SXSW, Glastonbury, Lowlands, Sziget, Pukkelpop, Rock Werchter, and DEICHBRAND to tours with bands like The Rolling Stones, Muse, and Biffy Clyro. In 2026, Torre Florim and his companions will return with "De Staat Becomes De Staat," a grand new project centered around a fresh album, live show, and a massive art installation that will once again raise the bar. Unthinkable? With De Staat, you can even consider the impossible possible.

Bio: Sticks is a pioneering Dutch rapper who began his career with the influential rap group Opgezwolle and later achieved success as a solo artist and member of supergroups like Fakkelbrigade and Great Minds.
My take: Sticks is widely regarded as one of the most influential figures in Dutch hip-hop, with a career that showcases versatility and innovation both as a performer and cultural contributor.
Festival Bio (NL): Als er één Nederlandstalige rapper is die mag opgaan voor de titel GOAT, dan is het wel Sticks. Ooit gestart in de baanbrekende rapcrew Opgezwolle, succesvol solo verder getrokken en bouwer van spannende supergroepen als Fakkelbrigade en Great Minds, met collegakanjers als Typhoon en Jiggy Djé. Daarnaast stortte de invloedrijke Zwollenaar zich op de uiteenlopendste bezigheden, van ambassadeur van voetbalclub PEC Zwolle tot oprichter van hiphopplatform Fakkelteitgroep en van A&R-man bij platenlabel Top Notch tot maker van een multimediaal kunstproject. Kortom, de ideale Special Guest op Down The Rabbit Hole, die naast een show op Hotot het hele weekend op de gekste plekken zal opduiken in de Groene Heuvels.
Festival Bio (EN): If there is one Dutch-speaking rapper who deserves to be considered for the title of GOAT, it’s Sticks. Once part of the groundbreaking rap crew Opgezwolle, he went on to have a successful solo career and built exciting supergroups like Fakkelbrigade and Great Minds, alongside fellow heavyweights such as Typhoon and Jiggy Djé. Additionally, the influential artist from Zwolle has delved into a wide range of activities, from being an ambassador for the PEC Zwolle football club to founding the hip-hop platform Fakkelteitgroep, and from working as an A&R representative at the record label Top Notch to creating a multimedia art project. In short, the perfect Special Guest for Down The Rabbit Hole, where, in addition to a show at Hotot, he will pop up in the most unexpected places around the Groene Heuvels all weekend long.

Bio: ¥ØU$UK€ ¥UK1MAT$U is a DJ and former construction worker from Osaka who turned to music after a life-changing diagnosis. Known for high-energy sets blending heavy metal, techno, and bass music, he is recognized for his innovative transitions and adrenaline-pumping performances.
My take: ¥ØU$UK€ ¥UK1MAT$U's genre-defying style and fearless approach to mixing make him a standout in the dance music scene, offering a glimpse into the future of the genre.
Festival Bio (NL):
‘Your favourite DJ’s favourite DJ’ dekt de lading van ¥ØU$UK€ ¥UK1MAT$U’s genialiteit. De diagnose van een hersentumor deed de voormalige bouwvakker uit Osaka beseffen dat hij zijn talenten moest volgen. Nu verovert hij de wereld met krankzinnig goede sets die een dikke dosis adrenaline in de dansscene injecteren. Geen transitie is te gek voor deze duizendpoot: gestoorde edits van heavy metal, rammende techno en overweldigende bass-drops blazen zijn extatische publiek omver. Verplichte kost als je de toekomst van dansmuziek wilt horen.

Foto door Jun Yokoyama
Festival Bio (EN):
'Your favourite DJ’s favourite DJ' perfectly encapsulates the brilliance of ¥ØU$UK€ ¥UK1MAT$U. A brain tumor diagnosis made the former construction worker from Osaka realize he needed to pursue his talents. Now, he’s taking the world by storm with insanely good sets that inject a hefty dose of adrenaline into the dance scene. No transition is too wild for this jack-of-all-trades: insane edits of heavy metal, pounding techno, and overwhelming bass drops leave his ecstatic audience in awe. A must-hear if you want to experience the future of dance music.

Photo by Jun Yokoyama

Bio: Zwangere Guy is a Belgian rapper known for his raw and introspective lyrics, often delivered in his native Brussels dialect. He has gained acclaim for his impactful storytelling and energetic performances, becoming a prominent figure in the Belgian hip-hop scene.
My take: Zwangere Guy is celebrated for his authenticity and dynamic stage presence, making him a standout in European hip-hop.
Festival Bio (NL):
Deze herboren Brusselse rapper werkte van debuut ‘Wie is Guy?’ naar nieuweling ‘Dit is Guy.’ een mentale hordenloop van vallen en opstaan af en vond de antwoorden die hij zocht. Salut drank en drugs, welkom gezonde lifestyle en dochter Zaza. Ook nieuw is Zánger Guy, zoals in het lieflijke ‘Gorik Pt. 2’. In het rauwe tweeluik ‘Vecht Voor Papier’ laait de engagementvlam op en in ‘Papucho’ openbaart zich andermaal zijn lenige flow. En dan die rake samples en smaakvolle startstopbeats! Zwangere Guy, wij zien u graag, punt.

Foto door Laurens Leroy
Festival Bio (EN):
This reborn Brussels rapper transitioned from his debut 'Wie is Guy?' to the new release 'Dit is Guy.'—a mental hurdle race of ups and downs—and found the answers he was seeking. Goodbye alcohol and drugs, hello healthy lifestyle and daughter Zaza. Also new is Singer Guy, as heard in the tender 'Gorik Pt. 2.' In the raw two-part track 'Vecht Voor Papier,' the flame of engagement burns brightly, and in 'Papucho,' his agile flow shines once again. And then there are those striking samples and tasteful start-stop beats! Zwangere Guy, we admire you, period.

Photo by Laurens Leroy

Bio: Arp Frique & The Perpetual Singers is a project led by Dutch producer and musician Niels Nieuborg, blending disco, funk, and Afro-Caribbean influences into a vibrant and eclectic sound.
My take: Their music is celebrated for its infectious grooves and cross-cultural appeal, making them a standout act in the global music scene.
Festival Bio (NL): Injecteer soulvolle gospel met een flinke dosis verrukte P-Funk en het verslavende resultaat zal gevaarlijk dicht in de buurt komen van Arp Frique & The Perpetual Singers. De Amsterdamse multi-instrumentalist Arp Frique componeerde zijn nieuwste album ‘The Gospel of Jesamy’ als dansbaar eerbetoon aan zijn pasgeboren dochter. Bijgestaan door een buitensporig goede band en legendarische zangers als Rocq-E Harrell – die onder andere werkte met Stevie Wonder en Earth Wind & Fire – vertaalt hij dat intieme opus naar een extatisch funkfeestje op het podium.
Festival Bio (EN): Inject soulful gospel with a hefty dose of ecstatic P-Funk, and the addictive result will come dangerously close to Arp Frique & The Perpetual Singers. The Amsterdam-based multi-instrumentalist Arp Frique composed his latest album, 'The Gospel of Jesamy,' as a danceable tribute to his newborn daughter. Supported by an exceptionally talented band and legendary singers like Rocq-E Harrell—who has worked with the likes of Stevie Wonder and Earth, Wind & Fire—he translates this intimate opus into an ecstatic funk party on stage.

Bio: Avalon Emerson is an American electronic music producer and DJ known for her genre-blending approach to house and techno, as well as her innovative remixes and original productions that have earned her critical acclaim in the electronic music scene.
My take: Avalon Emerson is celebrated for her dynamic live DJ sets and her ability to seamlessly blend genres, making her a standout artist in the electronic music world.
Festival Bio (NL): Ze maakte furore in San Francisco, voordat ze naar Berlijn verhuisde om nieuw leven in de technohoofdstad te blazen. De sets van Avalon Emerson zijn namelijk briljant: eclectisch, uiterst dansbaar en onbeschrijflijk episch. Weinig deejays zijn zo behendig in uiteenlopende muzikale lagen op elkaar stapelen tot een schitterend nieuw geheel. Obscure bangers en creatieve edits van gerenommeerde artiesten vloeien naadloos in elkaar over, zelfs als ze ruim elf uur nachtdienst heeft achter de decks van Panorama Bar. Kortom: letterlijk niemand doet het zoals Avalon Emerson.
Festival Bio (EN): She made a name for herself in San Francisco before moving to Berlin to breathe new life into the techno capital. Avalon Emerson's sets are nothing short of brilliant: eclectic, highly danceable, and indescribably epic. Few DJs are as skilled at layering diverse musical elements into a dazzling new whole. Obscure bangers and creative edits of renowned artists blend seamlessly, even during an eleven-hour night shift behind the decks at Panorama Bar. In short: absolutely no one does it like Avalon Emerson.

Bio: Baxter Dury is a British musician known for his distinctive spoken-word vocal style and atmospheric, synth-driven indie rock. He has released several critically acclaimed albums, blending wry, observational lyrics with lush, cinematic instrumentation.
My take: Baxter Dury is celebrated for his unique storytelling and charismatic stage presence, often delivering compelling live performances that highlight his artistry.
Festival Bio (NL):
Producer Paul Epworth (Florence + The Machine, Bloc Party, Adele) had een openbaring tijdens Baxter Dury’s optreden op Glastonbury 2024. Hij wist precies hoe Dury moest klinken op zijn volgende album. In The Church Studios vond Dury’s materiaal voor ‘Allbarone’ stilzwijgend zijn weg richting prullenbak en werden zijn, door vader Ian praktisch met de paplepel ingegoten vertelvocalen losgelaten in een nieuwe habitat. Intenser, elektrischer, dansbaarder – maar nog altijd met een uitermate funky ritmegevoel en bevrijdende refreinen als succesingrediënten. Over openbaringen gesproken.

Foto door Tom Beard
Festival Bio (EN):
Producer Paul Epworth (Florence + The Machine, Bloc Party, Adele) had a revelation during Baxter Dury's performance at Glastonbury 2024. He knew exactly how Dury should sound on his next album. At The Church Studios, Dury's material for 'Allbarone' silently found its way to the trash, and his narrative vocals—practically spoon-fed to him by his father Ian—were unleashed in a new habitat. More intense, more electric, more danceable – yet still with an exceptionally funky sense of rhythm and liberating choruses as key ingredients. Speaking of revelations.

Photo by Tom Beard

Bio: Charlotte Cardin is a Canadian singer-songwriter known for her blend of pop, jazz, and electronic influences, with critically acclaimed releases like her debut album 'Phoenix' which won several awards, including the 2022 Juno Award for Album of the Year.
My take: Charlotte Cardin is praised for her emotive vocal delivery and genre-blending style, and her live performances are often described as intimate and captivating.
Festival Bio (NL):
Mon dieu! De meest gedraaide Franstalige track op de Franse radio en tv werd gemaakt door een Canadese? Met ‘Feel Good’ (2024) zette Charlotte Cardin uit Montréal definitief voet op het Europese vasteland en wijde omstreken. In haar koffer neemt ze sublieme alternative pop mee, die met volmaakt afgepaste synths, beats en gitaren continu blijft verrassen. Zo ook Cardins teksten, waarin ze in het Frans én Engels geen onderwerp of persoonlijk detail uit de weg gaat – soms verleidelijk, dan weer confronterend, maar altijd raak.

Foto door Sise Drummond
Festival Bio (EN):
Mon dieu! The most-played French-language track on French radio and TV was created by a Canadian? With "Feel Good" (2024), Charlotte Cardin from Montréal firmly established her presence on the European mainland and beyond. She brings along sublime alternative pop, continuously surprising with perfectly balanced synths, beats, and guitars. The same goes for Cardin's lyrics, where she tackles every subject and personal detail in both French and English—sometimes seductive, other times confrontational, but always spot on.

Photo by Sise Drummond

Bio: Derya Yıldırım & Grup Şimşek is a contemporary band blending traditional Turkish folk music with psychedelic rock and jazz influences, creating a unique and modern sound. They are known for their innovative arrangements of Anatolian folk songs and their dynamic live performances.
My take: The band has been praised for their ability to modernize traditional Turkish music while maintaining its emotional depth, making them a standout act in the global psychedelic and world music scenes.
Festival Bio (NL):
Eeuwenoude folkmuziek uit Anatolië in een lekker psychedelisch jasje, dat is de sound van Derya Yıldırım en haar steengoede band Grup Şimşek. De in Hamburg geboren multi-instrumentalist met Anatolische roots noemt haar muziek outernational, dus voorbij de hokjes van landen en genres. Dat voel je als ze op het podium haar bağlama, een zevensnarige Turkse luit, bespeelt: heden en verleden smelten samen tijdens enerverende concerten waarin de rijke traditie van Turkse folk relevanter dan ooit klinkt. Behoud en vernieuwing gaan hier hand in hand.

Foto door Philomena Wolflingseder
Festival Bio (EN):
Centuries-old folk music from Anatolia wrapped in a delightful psychedelic vibe—that’s the sound of Derya Yıldırım and her outstanding band Grup Şimşek. The Hamburg-born multi-instrumentalist with Anatolian roots describes her music as "outernational," transcending the boundaries of countries and genres. You can feel it when she plays her bağlama, a seven-string Turkish lute, on stage: past and present merge during electrifying performances where the rich tradition of Turkish folk sounds more relevant than ever. Preservation and innovation go hand in hand here.

Photo by Philomena Wolflingseder

Bio: Florence Road is a four-piece grunge-pop band from Ireland, led by vocalist Lily Aron. They gained attention as a TikTok cover band and quickly rose to indie fame, supporting Olivia Rodrigo and working on their debut album.
My take: Florence Road's raw yet emotional sound, combined with their rapid rise in the indie scene, makes them a promising act for fans of nostalgic yet fresh grunge-pop.
Festival Bio (NL): De hoogtijdagen van MTV flitsen voor je ogen als je de grunge-pop van Florence Road hoort. De debuut-mixtape ‘Fall Back’ barst van de juweeltjes met rauwe rafelrandjes. De vierkoppige vriendengroep uit Ierland met zangeres Lily Aron aan het hoofd ontpopte zich in de kortste tijd tot indiesensatie. Ze begonnen als coverband op TikTok en stonden inmiddels al in het voorprogramma van Olivia Rodrigo. Nu sleutelt de rockband aan hun eerste album, terwijl ze het festivalcircuit onveilig maken met hun emotionele meezingers.
Festival Bio (EN): The glory days of MTV flash before your eyes when you hear the grunge-pop of Florence Road. Their debut mixtape ‘Fall Back’ is bursting with raw-edged gems. The four-piece group of friends from Ireland, led by singer Lily Aron, quickly emerged as an indie sensation. They started as a cover band on TikTok and have already opened for Olivia Rodrigo. Now, the rock band is working on their first album while taking the festival circuit by storm with their emotional sing-alongs.

Bio: Folk Bitch Trio, formed by Heide, Jeanie, and Gracie in Melbourne, captures everyday experiences through angelic harmonies, refined guitar chords, and sharp, thoughtful lyrics. Their debut album, recorded analog, showcases their close friendship and musical chemistry.
My take: The trio's blend of intricate harmonies and poetic lyricism makes them a standout act in the contemporary folk scene, with their debut album receiving praise for its authenticity and emotional depth.
Festival Bio (NL): Pluk de dag, richt een band op, dachten Heide, Jeanie en Gracie, om als Folk Bitch Trio hun alledaagse wel en wee in melodieën te vangen. Intussen is nog maar weinig alledaags voor deze Melbournese minstrelen. Zeker met hun analoog opgenomen debuutplaat, die je trilhaartjes wakker kietelt met engelachtige, soms a capella hogeschoolharmonieën en verfijnde gitaarakkoorden versus scherp doordachte teksten. De albumtitel vat meteen mooi samen hoe een hechte vriendschap kan uitgroeien tot wereldwijd tourende folkgroep, simpelweg door samen te besluiten: ‘Now Would Be A Good Time.’
Festival Bio (EN): Seize the day, start a band, thought Heide, Jeanie, and Gracie, to capture their everyday ups and downs in melodies as the Folk Bitch Trio. By now, little remains ordinary for these Melbourne minstrels. Especially with their analog-recorded debut album, which awakens your eardrums with angelic, sometimes a cappella high-level harmonies and refined guitar chords paired with sharply crafted lyrics. The album title perfectly encapsulates how a close friendship can evolve into a globally touring folk group, simply by deciding together: "Now Would Be A Good Time."

Bio: Kevin Morby is an American singer-songwriter and guitarist known for his introspective lyrics and a blend of indie rock and folk influences. He has released several critically acclaimed albums, including 'Singing Saw' and 'City Music', which showcase his poetic storytelling and unique sound.
My take: Kevin Morby is widely praised for his evocative songwriting and ability to craft atmospheric, emotionally resonant music. His live performances are often described as intimate and captivating, making him a standout in the indie music scene.
Festival Bio (NL):
Een nummer van Kevin Morby is het muzikale equivalent van door een fotoalbum met oude polaroids bladeren. De in Kansas opgegroeide en naar New York verhuisde singer-songwriter staat altijd met één been in het verleden. Hij is daardoor een van de weinige hedendaagse muzikanten die vergelijkingen met Bob Dylan en Leonard Cohen ook echt verdient. Pure nostalgie is het overigens niet: in zijn broeierige songs reflecteert deze troubadour op onze tumultueuze tijden. Het zijn hartstochtelijk odes aan de desolate plekken en eenzame mensen van de moderne wereld.

Foto door Katie Crutchfield
Festival Bio (EN):
A song by Kevin Morby is the musical equivalent of flipping through a photo album filled with old Polaroids. The singer-songwriter, who grew up in Kansas and moved to New York, always has one foot in the past. This makes him one of the few contemporary musicians who truly earns comparisons to Bob Dylan and Leonard Cohen. However, it’s not pure nostalgia: in his sultry songs, this troubadour reflects on our tumultuous times. They are passionate odes to the desolate places and lonely people of the modern world.

Photo by Katie Crutchfield

Bio: Kin'Gongolo Kiniata is a group from Kinshasa that creates explosive punky electronic music with a touch of afropop, using recycled everyday objects as instruments. They represent the new wave of Congolese music, blending tradition with a revolutionary modern sound.
My take: Their innovative use of recycled materials and socially charged themes make them a unique and impactful act, blending raw energy with cultural depth.
Festival Bio (NL):
Deze heren uit Kinshasa maken goud met rommel. In hun handen transformeren gerecyclede alledaagse objecten in veelzijdige instrumenten voor explosieve punky elektronica met een likje afropop. Kin'Gongolo Kiniata zijn vaandeldragers van de nieuwe Congolese muziek: geijkt op traditie, en met gestrekte vuist richting een verpletterend nieuw geluid. Op het podium geven ze een stem aan de bruisende straten van Kinshasa in de vorm van opruiende nummers over armoede, oorlog en overleving. When life gives you lemons? Deze supergroep maakt er revolutionaire feestmuziek van.

Foto door Mustache Muhanya
Festival Bio (EN):
These gentlemen from Kinshasa turn junk into gold. In their hands, recycled everyday objects transform into versatile instruments for explosive punky electronics with a touch of Afropop. Kin'Gongolo Kiniata are the torchbearers of the new Congolese music: rooted in tradition, with a raised fist towards a groundbreaking new sound. On stage, they give a voice to the vibrant streets of Kinshasa through provocative songs about poverty, war, and survival. When life gives you lemons? This supergroup turns them into revolutionary party music.

Photo by Mustache Muhanya

Bio: Lumï is a Rotterdam-based duo known for their harmony-rich folk-pop sound. Emerging through TikTok and Instagram, they have performed at Noorderslag 2025 and toured Europe with artists like Abby Sage, Flyte, and MARO.
My take: Their intimate and ethereal vocal harmonies set them apart, making them a promising act in the European indie scene.
Festival Bio (NL): Ze kwamen bovendrijven via TikTok en Insta, beklommen het podium op Noorderslag 2025, werkten het vaderlandse clubcircuit af en tourden door Europa, zowel op eigen titel als met artiesten als Abby Sage, Flyte en MARO. En dat alles met slechts een handjevol intieme poptracks op hun palmares, waarvoor ze wel al bijna de 250.000 streams aantikken. Niet slecht voor twee studenten aan de Rotterdamse muziekopleiding Codarts. Maar snappen doe je het helemaal, zodra Claudia en Loeki hun hemelse harmonyfolkzang op je loslaten.
Festival Bio (EN): They surfaced through TikTok and Insta, took the stage at Noorderslag 2025, toured the national club circuit, and traveled across Europe, both on their own and with artists like Abby Sage, Flyte, and MARO. And all of this with just a handful of intimate pop tracks to their name, which have already racked up nearly 250,000 streams. Not bad for two students from the Rotterdam music academy Codarts. But it all makes perfect sense once Claudia and Loeki unleash their heavenly harmony folk vocals on you.

Bio: Mall Grab and Narciss bring a dynamic back-to-back set, blending far-out house and obscure techno with melodic grooves, creating an electrifying dancefloor experience.
My take: This pairing promises a high-energy and genre-blending performance, perfect for fans of innovative and seamless DJ collaborations.
Festival Bio (NL):
Met melodieuze grooves als raakvlak gaan Mall Grab en Narciss schouder aan schouder de strijd achter de decks aan. Daarbij dans jij er met de winst vandoor, want dat deze dj/producers aan elkaar gewaagd zijn is nogal zacht uitgedrukt. De far-out house die Narciss serveert, pongt Mall Grab moeiteloos terug met obscure techno en andersom. Liefhebbers weten allang waar ze straks moeten zijn, maar wie nog nooit de magie van een b2b-set on fire heeft meegemaakt, kan zich geen beter debuut wensen.

Foto door Capture Charles
Festival Bio (EN):
With melodic grooves as their common ground, Mall Grab and Narciss go head-to-head behind the decks. And you come out as the winner, because saying these DJ/producers are evenly matched is quite an understatement. The far-out house served up by Narciss is effortlessly countered by Mall Grab with obscure techno, and vice versa. Enthusiasts already know where they need to be, but for those who have never experienced the magic of a back-to-back set on fire, there’s no better debut to wish for.

Photo by Capture Charles

Bio: The Mary Wallopers are an Irish folk group known for their modern take on traditional Irish ballads, blending humor and social commentary into their music.
My take: The Mary Wallopers are celebrated for their lively performances and ability to connect with audiences, making them a standout act in the contemporary folk scene.
Festival Bio (NL):
Dienstmededeling: Keltische folk is alive and well and living in The Mary Wallopers. Niet in bedaagde ouwemannenpubvorm, maar in de geest van de machtige Pogues (god hebbe hun ziel): rauw en recht uit het hart. Pure Irish rock-’n-roll. Opgetrokken rond de gebroeders Hendy en authentiek uitgerust met tin whistle en uileann pipes, viert de band uit Dundalk het leven in al zijn facetten, fier ten strijde trekkend tegen alles wat krom is – extreemrechts, de genocide in Gaza, kapitalisme en whatnot. Hail Mary!

Foto door Sorcha Frances Ryder
Festival Bio (EN):
Service announcement: Celtic folk is alive and well and living in The Mary Wallopers. Not in the form of a staid old-man pub act, but in the spirit of the mighty Pogues (may God rest their souls): raw and straight from the heart. Pure Irish rock ’n’ roll. Built around the Hendy brothers and authentically equipped with tin whistle and uileann pipes, the band from Dundalk celebrates life in all its facets, boldly taking a stand against all that is wrong—far-right extremism, the genocide in Gaza, capitalism, and whatnot. Hail Mary!

Photo by Sorcha Frances Ryder

Bio: Mind Enterprises is the musical project of Italian producer Andrea Tirone, known for blending retro Italo disco influences with modern electronic production.
My take: Mind Enterprises has been praised for their infectious grooves and retro-modern aesthetic, making their music highly danceable and appealing to fans of nostalgic yet innovative sounds.
Festival Bio (NL): Welkom aan de Costa della Musica, waar zongebruinde cocktailshakers op het ritme van italodisco hun kunsten vertonen. Met dank aan Mind Enterprises, het Turijnse producersduo Andrea Tirone en Roberto Conigliaro, dat een nieuwe generatie clubbende zand-, zee- en zonaanbidders laat kennismaken met de onweerstaanbare sound van shiny synthesizerbeats, zompige discobassen en vrolijke melodieën vol zomerse soundbites. Schud je booty in stijl en groove gladjes weg op de van campari doordrenkte dansvloer tot je geen soda meer kunt zeggen. Zo glijd je volledig mindful de italohemel binnen.
Festival Bio (EN): Welcome to the Costa della Musica, where sun-kissed cocktail shakers showcase their skills to the rhythm of Italo disco. Thanks to Mind Enterprises, the Turin-based producer duo Andrea Tirone and Roberto Conigliaro, a new generation of club-going sand, sea, and sun worshippers is being introduced to the irresistible sound of shiny synthesizer beats, groovy disco basslines, and cheerful melodies filled with summery soundbites. Shake your booty in style and smoothly groove away on the Campari-soaked dance floor until you can’t even say soda anymore. That’s how you glide mindfully into Italo heaven.

Bio: De Nachtwacht is a Dutch band led by Jiri Taihuttu, formerly known as Jiri11 in the hip-hop scene, now exploring a blend of Dutch-language indiepop and 70s-inspired soft rock.
My take: De Nachtwacht represents an impressive transformation for Jiri Taihuttu, showcasing his versatility and ability to bridge genres with a nostalgic yet modern sound.
Festival Bio (NL): Relax, Rembrandt. De Nachtwacht heeft net zo weinig met schilderijen te maken als met hiphop, het genre waarin frontman Jiri Taihuttu groot werd, als Jiri11. Dat was toen, nu geeft de geboren Limburger zijn innerlijke singer-songwriter de vrije teugel, gitaar in de aanslag en omringd door vier medebandleden die samen met hem een brug slaan tussen Nederlandstalige indiepop en de softrock van de jaren 70. En hoe. Deze spectaculaire make-over wordt niet voor niets als meesterwerk in de dop ontvangen.
Festival Bio (EN): Relax, Rembrandt. The Night Watch has as little to do with paintings as it does with hip-hop, the genre in which frontman Jiri Taihuttu made his mark as Jiri11. That was then; now the Limburg-born artist lets his inner singer-songwriter run free, guitar at the ready and surrounded by four bandmates who, together with him, bridge the gap between Dutch indie pop and the soft rock of the '70s. And how. This spectacular makeover is rightly being hailed as a masterpiece in the making.

Bio: Mysterious collaborative project, likely featuring Norwegian singer AURORA and possibly Tom Rowlands (The Chemical Brothers) or Tom Odell. Released via Decca label and represented by Standing Ovation (Bergen, Norway). The name appears to be a portmanteau combining 'TOM' + 'AURORA'. Known for their secretive approach, appearing on major festival lineups (Down The Rabbit Hole, Coachella, Øyafestivalen) before revealing their identity. AURORA has previously collaborated extensively with Tom Rowlands on songwriting, and released 'Butterflies' with Tom Odell.
My take: A mysterious supergroup collaboration bringing together established artists under a new identity. The project creates intrigue through anonymity while promising a unique live experience from proven talents. Strong placement on festival lineups suggests confidence from bookers in the quality of this venture.
